title: Understanding References
text: When copying formulas in spreadsheets, the type of cell reference used can affect how the formula behaves. There are three types of cell references: absolute, relative, and mixed.

title: Absolute vs Relative References
text: When you copy a formula with relative references, the cell references change based on the position where you paste it. Absolute references, on the other hand, remain constant no matter where you copy the formula.
